title: Can't Open client

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic uploaded by vernong. Help

body:
Every time I open it I get this

http://imgur.com/gallery/rEgw0

I uninstalled it and reinstalled it and when I try and open the client I still get this

replies.body: The kernel error you're seeing can happen when your patcher is trying to launch but is being blocked.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore permissions in your settings and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Hit-run as administrator and worked perfectly. Prob should have waited before uninstalling league ://///. Thanks a ton
